A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Watching the new younger generation trash my childhood\, drag it through the dirt\, throw my heroes in the bin and re-invent what didn't need re-inventing is crushing.  Gutted.  Script really sucked and was full of holes.  We end up with new bland characters\, intriguing ones discarded\, a whinging brat as the main Sith \"lord\" and not exactly much to look forwards to from now on.  Don't even mention the space Leia scene .. my only hope is that one day the kids get their favourites franchises destroyed by the next generation and ask for forgiveness.
